overview: Imran brings more than a decade of rapid, progressive experience in product management and development, setting product vision and market strategy, business process re-engineering and transformation, requirements gathering, and vendor selection and management. Prior to joining Paxfire, Imran served as the Director of Global Sourcing at AOL-Time Warner, managing performance of over 6,000 outsourced personnel in 18 locations worldwide. Previous to that, he was a product manager at MicroStrategy, a business intelligence enterprise software company, where he managed the development of the MicroStrategy Analytics application from concept to completion. Imran has held positions at Sprint-Nextel and Chase Securities (now JP Morgan Chase). He also founded a software application development company. Imran has a Masters in Chemistry from the University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill and a Bachelors from Bard College.
